content.rendered:
The new Sony Xperia 1 mark III is being hailed as Sony’s best handset yet – and we would have to agree. The Xperia 1 III is Sony’s new flagship smartphone and offers one of the best displays, impeccable battery life and an impressive camera that is easy to use.

Sony revealed their new flagship phone back in April 2021 – but it is only now being released, so we have had a good 4 months to get ready for this exciting launch and we can’t wait for you to get your hands on it.

Design

The design of the latest Xperia 1 III model is not dissimilar to previous models in the range. It features the same long and narrow design as its predecessors – this time with a 6.5 inch 21:9 aspect ratio display. The design makes this handset much longer than its rival handsets such as the Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra.

This time around, the Sony handset is a little thicker than the Xperia 1 II – this is purely to make room for the large battery and don’t worry you won’t even notice the difference in size!

Something worth noting is that this phone features front-facing stereo speakers, the same as previous models, but in this case, they are 30% louder so if you are looking for a phone that does your music justice – this could be the one.

Display

Sony Xperia handsets are the only ones to feature 4K resolution so you can always be sure you’re getting a stunning display. This time, Sony have opted for a 120Hz refresh rate – so the Xperia 1 III is at the top of the game. Making playing games, watching videos and streaming content much easier.

Camera

It might not seem like much has been updated at first glace however there are some serious improvements to the camera on the Xperia 1 III. Not only does the 12MP 24mm main camera improve the image quality but the optical image stabilisation keeps pictures steady – great for anyone with a shaky hand. Not only that but the ultra-wide camera lets you take a range of shots – with a variable telephoto camera which can actually switch between focal lengths.

Features

This device has a massive 256GB of storage so you can keep all of your perfectly shot images and videos as well as all your apps. Not only that, but one of the most impressive things about this new handset is the battery life. Compared to the Xperia 1 II there is a significant improvement in battery life – so even with all the great features of this phone it should last all day (and beyond).

Deals at Fonehouse

You all know by now, we love a good deal at Fonehouse. So, when you purchase a Sony Xperia 1 III from 19th August you will receive a free pair of Sony WH-1000XM3 headphones. All you need to do is purchase the handset or a qualifying contract and you will receive your headphones with your device.

Check out our available Sony deals today!
